Test Case Description: Verify a new todo item can be added successfully
Pre-condition: Todo application is loaded in browser
Test Case Procedure:
1. Enter "Buy groceries" in the "What needs to be done?" input field
2. Press Enter key
Expected Output:
A new todo item with text "Buy groceries" appears
in the todo list

Test Case Description: Verify multiple todo items can be added
Pre-condition: Todo application is loaded in browser
Test Case Procedure:
1. Enter "Task 1" in the input field and press Enter
2. Enter "Task 2" in the input field and press Enter
3. Enter "Task 3" in the input field and press Enter
Expected Output: Three separate todo items appear in the list in the same order they were entered

Test Case Description: Verify a todo item can be marked as completed
Pre-condition: Todo application is loaded with at least one todo item
Test Case Procedure: 1. Click the circle checkbox before the todo item
Expected Output:
1. The todo item should be marked as completed (checkbox checked)
2. The text should be crossed out (with line-through style)

Test Case Description: Verify a completed todo item can be marked as active again
Pre-condition: Todo application has at least one completed todo item
Test Case Procedure: 1. Click the checkbox of a completed todo item
Expected Output: The todo item should return to active state (checkbox unchecked, text not crossed out)

Test Case Description: Verify todo items can be filtered by "Active" status
Pre-condition: Todo application has a mix of completed and active todo items
Test Case Procedure: 1. Click on the "Active" filter link at the bottom of the list
Expected Output: Only active (uncompleted) todo items should be displayed

Test Case Description: Verify todo items can be filtered by "Completed" status
Pre-condition: Todo application has a mix of completed and active todo items
Test Case Procedure: 1. Click on the "Completed" filter link at the bottom of the list
Expected Output: Only completed todo items should be displayed

Test Case Description: Verify deleted todo items are removed from the list
Pre-condition: Todo application has at least one todo item
Test Case Procedure:
1. Hover mouse over a todo item
2. Click the "×" button that appears on the right side of the item
Expected Output: The todo item should be removed from the list

Test Case Description: Verify the "Clear completed" button removes all completed items
Pre-condition: Todo application has multiple completed todo items
Test Case Procedure: 1. Click the "Clear completed" button at the bottom of the list
Expected Output: All completed todo items should be removed, active items remain

Test Case Description: Verify the item counter correctly shows number of active items
Pre-condition: Todo application is loaded in browser
Test Case Procedure:
1. Add several todo items
2. Mark some as completed
3. Observe the counter in the bottom left
Expected Output: The counter should display the exact number of active (uncompleted) todo items

Test Case Description: Verify a todo item's text can be edited
Pre-condition: Todo application has at least one todo item
Test Case Procedure:
1. Double-click on an existing todo item text
2. Edit the text to "Updated task"
3. Press Enter key
Expected Output: The todo item text should be updated to "Updated task"

Test Case Description: Verify empty todo items cannot be created
Pre-condition: Todo application is loaded in browser
Test Case Procedure:
1. Enter only spaces in the input field
2. Press Enter key
Expected Output: No new todo item should be created

Test Case Description: Verify "Mark all as complete" toggle functionality
Pre-condition: Todo application has multiple active todo items
Test Case Procedure: 1. Click the down arrow toggle button on the left of the input field
Expected Output: All todo items should be marked as completed

Test Case Description: Verify persistence of todo items after page refresh
Pre-condition: Todo application has several todo items in various states
Expected Output: All todo items and their states should remain unchanged after the page refresh

Test Case Description: Verify long text handling in todo items
Pre-condition: Todo application is loaded in browser
Test Case Procedure:
1. Enter very long text (200+ characters) as a todo item
2. Press Enter key
Expected Output: The todo item should be created and display the full text properly (possibly with wrapping)

Test Case Description: Verify cancellation of edit mode without saving changes
Pre-condition: Todo application has at least one todo item
Test Case Procedure:
1. Double-click a todo item to enter edit mode
2. Modify the text
3. Press Escape key
Expected Output: Edit mode should exit and the todo item should revert to its original text
